description: Finds a key in a map and returns the paired (associated) value.

input.name: dictionary
input.description: The map to lookup the key-value pairing.

input.name: default
input.description:
The value to be returned if `query` is not found in `dictionary`.
If unspecified, defaults to `null`.

output.name: value
output.description: The value in `dictionary` associated to `query` if found, otherwise the value of `default`.
